DOC.brief_summary: This study aim combine inspiration breath-hold myocardial perfusion SPECT coronary CT angiography .
DOC.criteria: Referral cardiac hybrid SPECT/CCTA Male female subject 18 year age old Written inform consent participant information project Contraindications coronary CT angiography ( include renal failure GFR < 30ml/min/1.73m2 , allergy iodinate contrast agent ) Pregnancy breastfeed Previous coronary revascularisation Inability follow examination procedure ( e.g . due language barrier , severe mental disease etc
